title: How to develop connected apps using Azure and Xamarin

json.text: developers can build mobile apps with beautiful UX and native performance for
Android iOS and Windows with visual studio and zamaron whether you're
building from scratch or extending existing mobile apps you need a back-end
platform that is just as dependable that works everywhere every time a back-end
that provides all the building blocks supports all major mobile dev platforms
and scales to your needs a back-end platform like Microsoft Azure sure
allows you to connect your app to enterprise systems and on-premises
resources and scale your app to millions of customers across multiple geographies
azor has a huge number of capabilities including streamlined integrated
developer tools and mobile SDKs and all the building blocks you need to help you
build powerful mobile apps quickly azor provides a collection of must have
integrated cloud services such as a giraffe service with mobile apps that
help you build engaging mobile apps fast user authentication provides a way for
your application to easily sign-in users an app service supports five identity
providers right out of the box including Azure Active Directory Facebook Google
Microsoft account and Twitter as well as your own custom identity solutions and
with the notification hubs your apps can broadcast personalized push
notifications to millions in minutes like breaking news new enterprise
messages and even location-based coupons use offline data sync to create robust
apps that remain useful when there are network issues so that users can create
and modify data even when they're offline so what about storage whether
it's images photos documents or customer records in the cloud or on-premises
Azure storage makes it simple to create or integrate the right kind of storage
for the task as your storage is massively scalable and accessible from
anywhere and from any device whether your users are online or off so we know
as your mobile apps can help you speed up the creation of a reliable and
scalable back-end but wait there's more with just a few lines of code you can
access multiple other cloud services and Azure that can enrich your apps even
more with features such as facial recognition intelligent BOTS visual
search and hundreds of other kinds of advanced functionality get your mobile
dev ops and continuous integration and delivery process integrated quickly with
visual studio team services and T fess hockey app and xamarin test cloud
as a mobile developer you have more possibilities than ever before with the
power of the cloud at your fingertips and it's never been easier to harness
that power with Microsoft Azure to learn more visit Asher com forward slash
Dameron and try Asher for free today
